attributes.action: Make every individual standing for election to produce a detailed CV in line with every other job application
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent events call into question the quality and morality of MP's. A detailed CV (education & work history) would give a much clearer indication of their qualities, successes and abilities.  Gaps or misleading information should make them ineligible for election. Misinformation should lead to deselection as in other jobs.
